meanings.definition: The act of separating a company into smaller entities.
meanings.sent1: Demergering can lead to the creation of more focused businesses.
meanings.sent2: The demergering of the company resulted in two separate entities.
meanings.sent3: During the demergering, the company felt like a puzzle being solved.
meanings.sent4: The demergering process was like untangling a knot of businesses.
meanings.sent5: The demergering was like breaking a big cookie into smaller pieces.

meanings.definition: The process of dividing a business into distinct units.
meanings.sent1: After the demergering, each unit operated independently.
meanings.sent2: Demergering can help streamline the management of a business.
meanings.sent3: The demergering of the business felt like organizing a messy room.
meanings.sent4: The demergering process was like splitting a deck of cards.
meanings.sent5: The demergering made the business structure clearer and more efficient.

meanings.definition: The action of splitting a corporation into individual companies.
meanings.sent1: Demergering can result in the formation of new companies.
meanings.sent2: The demergering of the corporation was a complex but necessary step.
meanings.sent3: The demergering of the corporation was like unwrapping a gift with multiple layers.
meanings.sent4: The demergering process was akin to breaking a large rock into smaller pieces.
meanings.sent5: The demergering transformed the corporation into separate entities with unique identities.
